DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a stair that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specifically for the predefined types.
NOTE  The PredefinedType shall only be used, if no IfcStairType is assigned, providing its own IfcStairType.PredefinedType.
IFC4 CHANGE The attribute has been renamed from ShapeType and changed to be OPTIONAL with upward compatibility for file based exchange.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcStairType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcStairTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcStairTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no stair type object associated, i.e. the IsTypedBy inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type IfcStairType.
